keyMoments.title: Escape from Loguetown
keyMoments.description: The Straw Hat Pirates successfully escape from Loguetown and the pursuing Marines, setting sail for the Grand Line.
keyMoments.significance: Marks the crew's successful departure from the East Blue and transition to the Grand Line.

keyMoments.title: Grand Line Vow Ceremony
keyMoments.description: The entire crew performs the iconic barrel ceremony where each member places their foot on a barrel and declares their individual dream before entering the Grand Line.
keyMoments.significance: One of the most iconic and defining moments for the Straw Hat Pirates, solidifying their bonds and individual motivations as they embark on the most dangerous part of their journey.

keyMoments.title: Approaching the Grand Line
keyMoments.description: The crew successfully navigates toward the entrance to the Grand Line.
keyMoments.significance: Represents the culmination of their East Blue journey and the beginning of their Grand Line adventure.

flagDescription: A skull wearing a straw hat with crossed bones behind it

keyMoments.title: Formation of Buggy-Alvida Alliance
keyMoments.description: Buggy and Alvida, having both been defeated by Luffy and captured by Smoker, decide to form an alliance to pursue the Straw Hats into the Grand Line.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes this alliance that will become recurring antagonists later in the series.

keyMoments.title: Escape via Green Wind
keyMoments.description: The alliance is freed from Smoker's capture by the mysterious green wind, allowing them to pursue the Straw Hats.
keyMoments.significance: Shows how Dragon's intervention inadvertently helped other pirates escape as well.

keyMoments.title: Smoker Captures Multiple Pirate Crews
keyMoments.description: Marine Captain Smoker demonstrates the Marines' effectiveness by easily capturing Buggy, Alvida, and their entire crews using his Devil Fruit powers.
keyMoments.significance: Showcases the Marines' strength and their role as gatekeepers preventing pirates from entering the Grand Line.

keyMoments.title: Marines Pursue into Grand Line
keyMoments.description: Smoker and his Marines decide to pursue the Straw Hats beyond their jurisdiction into the Grand Line.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the Marines' determination and sets up future encounters with Smoker.

flagDescription: White seagull on blue background with the word 'MARINE'
